tasks.prompt: Maintain a fixed 4:3 medium shot from start to finish, camera locked on center with no zoom, pan, tilt, rotation, wobble or drift. The female character stands exactly centered; facial features, expression, hairstyle and hair color remain fully consistent and crisply defined with no quality loss. She holds a gentle, natural smile with soft micro-expressions—no stiffness, no twitching, no distortion. Lighting is soft, even, clean and neutral with no color shift. After a brief still moment, pure-white particles begin to spiral around her body, rapidly ramping to a very high density; particles are crisp, finely detailed and luminous. At peak density, a concise “magic burst” occurs—a short, bright, pure-white radial surge that fully occludes the entire frame. Only on the exact burst frame (100% coverage), perform a single-frame hard swap: the previous outfit vanishes completely and the new outfit appears fully formed and locks instantly (no blending, no fade, no delay, no partial transition, no dual exposure). New outfit: a red velvet strapless one-piece bodycon straight mini dress, perfectly fitted with a clean straight hemline—no flare, no layering, no A-line or gown expansion. Feather trim (neckline and lower hem) is pure white, 3D fluffy and floating above the velvet with visible air separation; treat feathers as a mandatory garment boundary that renders clearly and color-true immediately after the swap. Velvet shows a soft, controlled sheen with only minimal subtle sequin sparkle. After the swap, particles dissipate quickly and cleanly to reveal a stable frame. Movement: continue with a slow, elegant, soft dance—small, graceful, continuous motion; arms in short smooth arcs with relaxed wrists; subtle breathing in the waist; posture aligned and balanced; refined and calm. Framing remains a fixed centered 4:3 composition at all times. In the last two seconds, an optional very slow push to a clean medium-close keeps face, shoulders and upper body in sharp focus with natural skin tone and even light, closing on a refined, softly lit aesthetic.
tasks.negative_prompt: Beige straight-leg pants, black trousers, jeans, leggings, pant-like silhouettes; bows, bow ties, neck ribbons, chokers, necklaces, pendants, brooches or center ornaments at the neckline; straps, spaghetti straps, halter cuts, off-shoulder ruffle tiers or layered frills around the neckline; A-line spread, fishtail, flared or layered skirt volume—the outfit must remain a strapless one-piece bodycon straight mini dress. Swap/temporal artifacts: outfit fusion or layering, blending, morphing, interpolation/inbetweening/tweening, transition blur, frame blending, motion trails, residual frames, smoothing pass, ghosting, double exposure, time-stretch, frame mismatch/averaging; leftover old outfit, partial/incomplete outfit, missing trims, incorrect color/ornament; cloth growth or gradual formation, partial frame swap, misalignment, flicker, deformation, overlap, unstable fabric boundary, soft/bleeding edges. Feathers: missing or thinned neckline feather band, gaps along the front neckline, flattened/printed-on look, lace/tulle substitution, hem feathers turning into skirt frills or extending length; particle layer merging with, occluding or tinting feathers; feather color-cast (red/pink/silver/metallic). Feathers must remain pure white, 3D, fluffy, with visible air separation, always clearly visible. Face/hair: face change, rigid/forced smile, twitch, expression desync or identity morph; hair drift, flicker, transparency or particle-blending; detail loss, face blur. Motion: exaggerated dance, large arm swings, jumps/spins, rapid steps; jerky rhythm, robotic stiffness, over-bent or dislocated joints, off-axis posture, body drift—movement stays subtle and graceful. Camera/lighting: pan, tilt, zoom, slide, wobble, drift, shake, axis deviation; framing/center shift, perspective distortion, focal drift—keep fixed centered 4:3; lighting flicker, exposure pulses, color shift, metallic glare, glow bloom, LUT/grade that alters feather color.

tasks.prompt: 自始至終以4/3中景穩定取景，畫面居中不縮放、不平移、不旋轉。女主角站定於畫面正中央，臉部五官、表情、髮型與髮色全程鎖定，細節銳利無降質。臉部保持自然柔和微笑，嘴角弧度微翹、神情溫婉真實，不出現僵硬、抖動或表情扭曲。整體光線溫暖均勻、畫面乾淨穩定。她靜候片刻，明亮的白色聖誕風格粒子自周身旋繞，粒子閃爍柔和細緻、帶有節慶暖光感，密度迅速上升，於極短時間內凝成100%覆蓋全畫面的光粒幕布；覆蓋達成的同一幀僅針對服裝執行單幀瞬切，舊服裝同幀消失，新服裝同幀完整出現且立即鎖死，換裝乾淨俐落、自然連貫、無融合、無延遲、無跳接。新服裝＝紅色天鵝絨無肩帶連體衣（one-piece bodysuit only），僅在上緣與下擺飾以豐厚柔軟白色羽毛，羽毛層次完整、邊緣清晰、蓬鬆自然。布面呈柔和微光反射，亮片數量減少、僅作細微點綴，整體服裝貼合身體、材質真實穩定、輪廓清晰無跳動。光粒幕層於換裝完成後自然散去，畫面恢復穩定。角色落地後以柔和自然舞動呈現節奏感，手臂輕盈擺動、幅度小、動作柔順且重心穩定，髖部輕微律動與呼吸感相連，姿態自然流暢、動作連貫不僵硬。全程維持4/3中景與居中構圖，角色始終可見、不跳切、不淡出。尾聲最後兩秒鏡頭緩慢前推，收於穩定中近景，臉、肩與上半身清晰銳利，膚質自然、光比柔和，整體畫面於溫暖聖誕氛圍中完美收束。
